roleset.name: to miss a step while walking, to make an error
roleset.note: STUMBLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'stumble' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from stumble.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The Japanese have watched the Europeans and Canadians stumble in the U.S. market , and they fret that business practices that [*T*-1] have won them huge profits at home wo n't translate into success in the U.S. .

example.name: transitive
example.text: What [*T*-1] 's more , the losses [0]they and the others caused [*T*-3] `` are just what we are stumbling over [*T*-2] , '' says [0] [*T*-5] Mr. Stapf , [*-4] adding that the majority of misdeeds probably go [*-6] undetected .
example.arg: what -> the losses [0] they and the others caused [*T*-3]
